title: UberDanger, on his humorous League review, points out something that is 100% true
body:
http://youtu.be/h0IiNSoiSZQ?t=2m16s

Y'all seem to be missing the point. It starts at 2:16 and he says that the ranked system is based on how much time you have, not how good you are. 

"Someone with a lot of time and a little skill will make it a lot further than someone with a lot of skill and a little time."
